education.institution: Higher Institute of Computer Science, Tunis, Tunisia

key_responsibilities: Built an interactive and responsive platform for an e-commerce website using ReactJS and Sass
Developed efficient backend functionalities including user authentication, product management, order processing using Express JS
Integrated live chat functionality using Socket.io to enable real-time communication
Created secure API endpoint for online payment using Stripe
Implemented a comprehensive admin dashboard for managing the e-commerce platform
Developed a browser extension for recording YouTube livestreams using ReactJS
Integrated with the YouTube API to detect and capture livestream content
